<style>
    .parallax { 
    
        /* Set the background image */

    }

      left: 0;

    }

      font-size: 42px;
    }
    
    
    .downbutton {
      background: rgba(0,0,0,0);
      border: none;
      outline: none;
      color: #1BC7DC;
